exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_call_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="86" minWidth="235"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_call_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_call_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_no_call_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="86" minWidth="235"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_no_call_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_no_call_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_rob_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="86" minWidth="235" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_rob_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_rob_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_no_rob_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="86" minWidth="235"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_no_rob_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_no_rob_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.bar_call_lord" width="488" height="176" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="80">
        <e:Image id="clockImage" width="94" height="80" source="lord_clock_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
        <e:Label id="clockLabel" size="32" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" horizontalCenter="0" top="20" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group id="callBtnGrop" width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="16" verticalAlign="bottom" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:Button id="callBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_call_skin" />
        <e:Button id="noCallBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_no_call_skin" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group id="robBtnGrop" width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="14" verticalAlign="bottom" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:Button id="robBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_rob_skin" />
        <e:Button id="noRobBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_no_rob_skin" />
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.bar_my_info_skin" height="46" width="1280" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" source="bottom_infobar_bg_png" locked="true" />
    <e:Label id="nameLabel" size="28" text="来宾470941836" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"
             fontFamily="Tahoma" left="20" top="8" />
    <e:Image height="40" width="40" source="lord_gold_png" left="260" top="6" locked="true" />
    <e:Label id="goldLabel" size="28" text="32545645" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"
             fontFamily="Tahoma" left="302" top="8" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_pass_skin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="88" minWidth="237"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_pass_normal_png" source.down="btn_lord_pass_down_png"
             source.disabled="btn_lord_pass_disabled_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_prompt_skin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="88" minWidth="237"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_prompt_normal_png" source.down="btn_lord_prompt_down_png"
             source.disabled="btn_lord_prompt_disabled_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_product_skin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="88" minWidth="237"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_product_normal_png" source.down="btn_lord_product_down_png"
             source.disabled="btn_lord_product_disabled_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.bar_play_card" width="739" height="178" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="80">
        <e:Image id="clockImage" width="94" height="80" source="lord_clock_bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
        <e:Label id="clockLabel" size="32" bold="true" textColor="0xFFFFFF" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" horizontalCenter="0" top="20" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="16" verticalAlign="bottom" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:Button id="passBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_pass_skin" />
        <e:Button id="promptBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_prompt_skin" />
        <e:Button id="productBtn" skinName="skins.btn_lord_product_skin" />
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_classic_lord_enter_skin" states="up,down" height="328" width="216"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_classic_lord_enter_up_png"
             source.down="btn_classic_lord_enter_up_png" alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_flash_lord_enter_skin" states="up,down" height="272" width="136"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_flash_lord_enter_up_png" source.down="btn_flash_lord_enter_up_png"
             alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<e:Skin class="skins.btn_happy_lord_enter_skin" states="up,down" height="282" width="186"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_happy_lord_enter_up_png" source.down="btn_happy_lord_enter_up_png"
             alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lobby_match_item_normal_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="147" minWidth="508"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="lobby_match_item_normal_bg_up_png" source.down="lobby_match_item_normal_bg_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_zone_1_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="324" minWidth="316" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_zone_1_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_zone_1_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_zone_2_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="324" minWidth="316" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_zone_2_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_zone_2_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_zone_3_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="324" minWidth="316" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_zone_3_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_zone_3_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_lord_zone_4_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="324" minWidth="316" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_lord_zone_4_up_png" source.down="btn_lord_zone_4_down_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_match_item_detail_signup_skin" states="up,down,disabled" width="350" height="116"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="match_item_detail_signup_btn_up_png"
             source.down="match_item_detail_signup_btn_down_png"
             source.disabled="match_item_detail_signup_btn_disable_png" />
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8" textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle"
             textAlign="center" size="50" fontFamily="Tohama"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_menu_skin" states="up,down" height="84" width="134"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_menu_up_png" source.down="btn_menu_up_png"
             alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_panel_close_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="117" minWidth="117"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="close_btn_up_png" source.down="close_btn_down_png" />
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_pk_lord_enter_skin" states="up,down" minHeight="296" minWidth="176"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_pk_lord_enter_up_png" source.down="btn_pk_lord_enter_up_png"
             alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_return_hall_skin" states="up,down" height="84" width="134"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_return_hall_up_png" source.down="btn_return_hall_up_png"
             alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_return_skin" states="up,down" height="84" width="134" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_return_up_png" source.down="btn_return_up_png" alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.btn_wild_lord_enter_skin" states="up,down" height="308" width="194"
        xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_wild_lord_enter_up_png" source.down="btn_wild_lord_enter_up_png"
             alpha.down="0.6" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.dialog_common_skin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width="500" height="300">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" source="common_dialog_bg_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="59">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" source="common_dialog_title_bg_png" maxHeight="59" />
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="26" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x7F5029" wordWrap="false"
                 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" skinName="skins.btn_panel_close_skin" right="0" top="0" width="64" height="64" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.indicatorPage_lobby_game_entry_skin" width="1080" height="390" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:List id="gameEntryList" width="100%" height="100%" itemRendererSkinName="skins.widget_lobby_game_entry_skin">
        <e:layout>
            <e:TileLayout verticalGap="70" horizontalGap="70" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:ArrayCollection source="{data}" />
    </e:List>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.indicatorPage_lord_match_item_select_skin" width="1034" height="478" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:List id="matchItemList" width="100%" height="100%" itemRendererSkinName="skins.widget_lobby_match_item_skin">
        <e:layout>
            <e:TileLayout verticalGap="18" horizontalGap="18" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:ArrayCollection source="{data}" />
    </e:List>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.indicator_lobby_game_entry_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:List id="indicatorPageList" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="true" itemRenderer="gameui.indicatorPage_lobby_game_entry_skin">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="200" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:List>
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" bottom="50">
        <e:List id="indicatorSelectBar">
            <e:layout>
                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-8" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>
        <e:Image id="indicatorSelectImage" source="page_indicator_selected_png" x="0"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.indicator_lord_match_item_select_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:List id="indicatorPageList" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="true" itemRenderer="gameui.indicatorPage_lord_match_item_select_skin">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="252" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:List>
    <e:Group horizontalCenter="0" bottom="50">
        <e:List id="indicatorSelectBar">
            <e:layout>
                <e:HorizontalLayout gap="-8" />
            </e:layout>
        </e:List>
        <e:Image id="indicatorSelectImage" source="page_indicator_selected_png" x="0"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.panel_join_match_skin" width="900" height="600" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0"  source="common_dialog_bg_png" locked="true"/>
    <e:Image x="484" y="250" source="match_item_condition_bg_png" />
    <e:Label text="话费参赛券" x="484" y="250" fontFamily="Tahoma" width="350" size="36" height="80"
             textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"  textColor="0x4B0202"/>
	<e:Label id="tileTf" text="赢5元话费赛(免费报名)" x="0" y="46" textColor="0x800000" width="100%" size="50" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Image width="100%" height="2" x="0" y="140" source="match_item_split_h_png"/>
	<e:Image width="2" height="456" x="398" y="140" source="match_item_split_v_png"/>
	<e:Label id="startTimeTf" text="开赛时间：22:30" x="484" y="180" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x4B0202" size="36" width="360" height="50" verticalAlign="middle"/>
	<e:Label id="signTf" text="已报名：2230人" x="484" y="380" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x4B0202" size="36" width="360" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="left"/>
	<e:Button id="signBtn" label="报名" x="484" y="450" skinName="skins.btn_match_item_detail_signup_skin"/>
	<e:Button id="closeBtn" skinName="skins.btn_panel_close_skin" right="0" top="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.panel_my_playerInfo_skin" height="242" width="474" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" source="lord_playerinfo_bg_png" />
    <e:Group width="100%" left="20" height="118">
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout gap="20" verticalAlign="middle" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:Label id="nameLabel" size="28" text="pengsamkee" textColor="0x7F5029" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" />
        <e:Label id="levelLabel" size="22" text="等级：LV999" textColor="0x7F5029" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:List id="emotionList" width="100%" top="120">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:List>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.panel_other_playerInfo_skin" height="242" width="474" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="0" source="lord_playerinfo_bg_png" />
    <e:Group width="100%" left="20" height="118">
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout gap="20" verticalAlign="middle" />
        </e:layout>
        <e:Label id="nameLabel" size="28" text="pengsamkee" textColor="0x7F5029" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" />
        <e:Label id="levelLabel" size="22" text="等级：LV999" textColor="0x7F5029" textAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:List id="emotionList" width="100%" top="126">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:List>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.screen_lobby_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:gameui="gameui.*">
    <e:Image id="backgroundImage" source="lobby_bg_jpg" />
    <e:Image id="titleImage" source="lobby_title_png" horizontalCenter="0" top="30" />
    <gameui:indicator_lobby_game_entry_skin id="gameEntryIndicator" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.screen_lord_lobby_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:gameui="gameui.*">
    <e:Image id="bg_far" source="bg_far_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
    <e:Image id="bg_floor" source="bg_floor_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
    <e:Image id="lord_enter_shadow" source="lord_enter_shadow_png" horizontalCenter="0" y="320" />
    <e:Group id="lordEnterGroup" width="100%" touchEnabled="false">
        <e:Button id="pkLordEnterBtn" skinName="skins.btn_pk_lord_enter_skin" top="158" left="90" />
        <e:Button id="wildLordEnterBtn" skinName="skins.btn_wild_lord_enter_skin" top="190" left="290" />
        <e:Button id="classicLordEnterBtn" skinName="skins.btn_classic_lord_enter_skin" top="190" left="540" />
        <e:Button id="happyLordEnterBtn" skinName="skins.btn_happy_lord_enter_skin" top="214" left="804" />
        <e:Button id="flashLordEnterBtn" skinName="skins.btn_flash_lord_enter_skin" top="180" left="1040" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:Image id="label_pk_lord" source="label_pk_lord_png" x="70" y="418" />
    <e:Image id="label_wild_lord" source="label_wild_lord_png" x="288" y="450" />
    <e:Image id="label_classic_lord" source="label_classic_lord_png" x="530" y="480" />
    <e:Image id="label_happy_lord" source="label_happy_lord_png" x="790" y="440" />
    <e:Image id="label_flash_lord" source="label_flash_lord_png" x="1016" y="422" />
    <e:Component id="waterContainer" x="530" y="110" />
    <e:Component id="smokeContainerLeft" x="110" y="136" />
    <e:Component id="smokeContainerRight" x="1176" y="136" />
    <e:Image id="curtain_left" source="curtain_png" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="202" left="0" />
    <e:Image id="curtain_right" source="curtain_png" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="-202" right="0" />
    <e:Button id="returnHallBtn" skinName="skins.btn_return_hall_skin" top="20" left="20" />
    <e:Button id="menuBtn" skinName="skins.btn_menu_skin" top="20" right="20" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.screen_lord_match_select_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui"
        xmlns:gameui="gameui.*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image id="bg_far" source="bg_far_png" />
    <e:Image id="bg_floor" source="bg_floor_png" />
    <e:Image id="titleImage" source="" horizontalCenter="0" top="55" />
    <e:List id="matchList" width="100%" y="200" touchEnabled="false"
            itemRendererSkinName="skins.widget_lord_match_select_skin">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" />
        </e:layout>
    </e:List>
    <gameui:indicator_lord_match_item_select_skin id="matchItemSelectIndicator" x="1280" />
    <e:Component id="waterContainer" x="530" y="110" />
    <e:Component id="smokeContainerLeft" x="110" y="136" />
    <e:Component id="smokeContainerRight" x="1176" y="136" />
    <e:Image id="curtain_left" source="curtain_png" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="202" left="0" />
    <e:Image id="curtain_right" source="curtain_png" touchEnabled="false" anchorOffsetX="-202" right="0" />
    <e:Button id="returnBtn" skinName="skins.btn_return_skin" top="20" left="20" />
    <e:Button id="menuBtn" skinName="skins.btn_menu_skin" top="20" right="20" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.splash_common_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="backgroundImage" source="splash_bg_jpg" />
    <e:Image id="loadingImage" source="common_loading_png" verticalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.splash_lord_lobby_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="backgroundImage" source="splash_bg_jpg" />
    <e:Image id="loadingLogo" source="lord_loading_logo_png" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_card_skin" width="155" height="216" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="cardImage" />
    <e:Image id="shadeImage" source="lord_cards.lord_card_selected" visible="false" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_indicator_nav_skin" width="45" height="45" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="page_indicator_common_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_lobby_game_entry_skin" width="160" height="160" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group>
        <e:layout>
            <e:VerticalLayout gap="10" horizontalAlign="center"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image source="{data.icon}" />
        <e:Label width="100%" text="{data.name}" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false" size="32" fontFamily="Tahoma" />
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_lobby_match_item_skin" width="508" height="147" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button skinName="skins.btn_lobby_match_item_normal_skin" />
    <e:Label text="{data.name}" top="36" left="16" textColor="0x000000" touchEnabled="false"  size="36"/>
    <e:Label text="{data.playerNumbers}" top="43" right="16" touchEnabled="false" size="26"  textColor="0x222222"/>
    <e:Label text="{data.explanation}" top="88" left="16" touchEnabled="false" size="26"  textColor="0x001111"/>
    <e:Label text="{data.time}" top="88" right="16" touchEnabled="false" size="26"  textColor="0x001111"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_lord_match_select_skin" width="316" height="324" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Button id="selectBtn" skinName="{data}" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_my_emotion_skin" width="118" height="118" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="{data}" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_other_emotion_skin" width="118" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="{data}" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_player_skin" width="188" height="252" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="playerImage" source="lord_playerinfo_icon_farmer_face_to_right_png" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.widget_play_background_skin" width="1280" height="720" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="backgroundImage" source="lord_play_bg_1_png" />
</e:Skin>
